title: John Slatin AccessU
description: An annual conference where tech professionals, content creators, policymakers, and advocates come together for deep learning in accessible digital design.

title: World Hearing Day
description: World Hearing Day is held on 3 March each year to raise awareness on how to prevent deafness and hearing loss and promote ear and hearing care across the world.

title: Inclusive Design 24
description: Inclusive Design 24 (#id24) is a free 24-hour online event for the global community. It celebrates inclusive design and shares knowledge and ideas from analogue to digital, from design to development, from planners to practitioners, and everything and everyone in between.

title: axe-con
description: Axe-con is the worldâ€™s largest digital accessibility conference that welcomes developers, designers, business users, and accessibility professionals of all experience levels to an accessibility conference focused on building, testing, and maintaining accessible digital experiences.

title: TechShare Pro
description: AbilityNet TechShare Pro is Europe's largest gathering of accessibility and inclusion professionals and their allies.

title: CSUN Assistive Technology Conference
description: the ultimate community experience and the premier forum on technology for all persons with disabilities.

title: Business without Barriers
description: Business without Barriers is the leading event for anyone involved with rolling out accessibility initiatives within their organisations.

title: Business without Barriers
description: The annual conference and showcase of the Global Initiative for Inclusive Information and Communication Technologies (G3ict),

title: WordPress Accessibility Day
description: WordPress Accessibility Day is a 24-hour global event dedicated to promoting and learning website accessibility best practices for WordPress websites.

title: International Day of Persons with Disabilities
